title: JSC370: Data Science II
text:
Data
Many of these websites provide APIs and/or bulk downloads.

Canadian Data

Government of Canada Open Data (Open Government Portal)
Statistics Canada (Census + surveys)
Statistics Canada Web Data Service (API)
Canada GIS Data
University of Toronto Library (Geospatial data guides)
City of Toronto Open Data
Toronto Police Service Open Data
Ontario Data Catalogue
Public Health Ontario Open Data
British Columbia Data Catalogue



Environmental and Climate Data

US EPA Air Quality Data
US EPA AQS Data API (Air Quality System)
NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI)
NOAA NCEI Access Data Service (API)
North American Regional Climate Change Assessment Program (NARCCAP)
Natural Resources Canada (Geospatial data/tools)
Coastal wave / buoy data (CDIP, UCSD)
Great Lakes Bathymetry (NOAA)
US Energy Information Administration (EIA)



International and Global Data

UN Geospatial Hub
UNdata API manual
World Bank Open Data
World Bank Developer / API info
FAO FAOSTAT (global food/agriculture stats)
FAOSTAT API entry point
NASA Earthdata (data catalog)



US Data

Data.gov (catalog)
Data.gov Geospatial datasets
US Census (NHGIS)
NYU Spatial Data Repository
Google Earth Engine datasets
Google Dataset Search
FiveThirtyEight data (GitHub)
Los Angeles Open Data



Health and Biological Data

SEER (NIH/NCI cancer surveillance)
World Health Organization (GHO OData API)
CDC Open Data
California Health & Human Services Open Data
Canada COVID tracking (community project)
UniProt (proteins)
Gene Ontology



News, Media, and Text Data

New York Times APIs (specs repo)
The Guardian Open Platform
GDELT Project (global news/events)
Common Crawl (web archive)
Wikipedia / Wikimedia APIs (MediaWiki REST API)



Social Networks and Platforms

X (Twitter) Developer Platform
GitHub REST API
Instagram Platform
LinkedIn API documentation (Microsoft Learn)
Spotify Web API
Zillow Group Data & APIs



Academic Publications and Research Data

Figshare
Zenodo
Harvard Dataverse
Elsevier Developer APIs
OpenAlex (scholarly metadata + API)
